Definitions

Definition for ACS names

Definition for an admission during business hours

Returns the definition of CCLHD facilities

Definition the exclusion criteria for medication

Definition for heart failure ICD10 codes

Definition of internal transfer

NSLHD_facility()

Returns the definition of NSLHD facilities

Definition for separation modes of interest

Journeys

create_demographics()

Creates demographic information

create_discharge_letter_keys()

Extracts cohort discharge keys

create_interventions()

Creates categories for the types of interventions

create_meds_admit_discharge()

Extracts medications relevant to the cohort journeys

create_presentations()

Defines the presentation mode for journeys

create_separations()

Defines the separation mode for journeys

create_trajectory()

Categorises the trajectories of journeys

extract_triage_forms()

Extracts ATAMI triage forms

ACS

create_door_to_balloon()

Extracts door to balloon times

create_meds_discharge()

Creates discharge medication

create_stemi_code()

Creates SNOMED code column

extract_acs_procedures()

Extracts procedures from the given cohort

merge_mckesson_cerner_procedures()

Merges procedure table with McKesson data

select_acs_cohort()

Extracts the ACS cohort

Heart Failure

Extracts ICD10 heart failure encounters

Creates discharge medication

Extracts SNOMED heart failure encounters

Extracts echocardiogram procedures

Extracts heart failure cohort

load_table()

Loads the cache from SPEED-EXTRACT pipeline and the specified table
